subject: HISTORY
text: Explain the causes of the Peloponnesian War and account for the defeat of Athens.

subject: HISTORY
text: The deliberate policy of Alexander the Great was that the West should conquer the East and that East and West should mingle. Discuss this opinion of his policy.

subject: HISTORY
text: Trace the steps by which Roman rule was extended over Italy.

subject: HISTORY
text: Estimate the importance of the Gracchi in the social history of Rome.

text: "Trajan had directed the energy of the Empire outwards but all Hadrianâ€™s energy was devoted to conserving and organising it internally." How far is this true?

subject: HISTORY
text: Write notes on two of the following: the Attic theatre, the Spartan invasions of Greece, Socrates, the organisation of the Roman army in the last years of the Republic, the First Triumvirate.
